item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

5

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:23 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Pritom is a leading independent brand selling Tablet PC, Laptops, Mp3 since 2012, focusing on product quality and customer shopping experience.Our products have received CE, RoHS, FCC and other related certificates- – Pritom Team aims to provide the Highest Quality Products and the Most Attentive Service for our customers. SO if you have any questions/issues, please reach us via Email, we will give a solution asap! That it is important for us!

Enjoy Time with PRITOM Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

★[HIGH PERFORMANCE ANDROID TABLET ] – Pritom Tronpad tablets comes with Android 10 Go OS, 2GB RAM, 32 GB ROM, the powerful and energy-saving Quad-core Processor enables quicker app launch, smoother videos, you can enjoy better overall performance experience. In addition, it includes a Micro SD card slot (can be added a expanded 256 GB TF Card Max, NOT included), making it easy to store Pictures videos, files etc. There is NO extra bloatware installed. Note: This tablet can’t add a SIM Card.
★[LONG-LASTING ENTERTAINMENT] – Pritom 10 inch tablet features android 10, GMS Certified, you can download thousands of apps, such as, Netflix, YouTube, Skype, and more popular apps. The large battery and low-power CPU enhance your experience and allow you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more. It is a really good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Large IPS Touchscreen will be a plus.
★[Low bloatware & Dual Cameras] – With Front 2.0 MP & Rear 8.0 MP camera, which would bring your photos and videos to life. Pritom Tronpad 10” tablet rivals most of the 10 inch tablet and it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments with your friends and family. Pritom Tronpad tablet meets your basic daily needs, such as watching videos, Live and reading. A good tablet for your choise, very Low bloatware, No ads!
★[BRILLIANT IPS DISPLAY ] – Pritom 10 inch tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display. This android tablet has a sharper hierarchy of images and richer colors, and provides shocking performance of visual experience. With the Eye Health mode, an extra feature filters out blue light to relieve visual fatigue, and optimizes the backlight for a more comfortable reading experience.
★[1-year WARRANTY & SUPPORT] – Pritom Tablet PC comes with 1-year worry-free guarantee – If it is the tablet quality issue, return it and we’ll replace it for free. Pritom team focuses on the customer’s pleasant shopping experience and provides reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problem, we will give you on-time TECH SUPPORT and the better customer service. Looking foward to hearing from you(CS email).

PRITOM Tronpad Tablets, Meet All Your Basic Needs

  • PRITOM Tonpad tablet fits for everyone. This tablet has a large 10.1 inch high-definition touchscreen, 1280 * 800 IPS Display, 2.0 MP front and 8.0 MP rear camera. The ultra-high tablet configuration meets all your daily needs!
  • PRITOM tends to create the best products and the best user experience. Lightweight and portable tablets or ideal gifts? PRITOM Tablet, it’s worth having!

Designed for Entertainment

  • The 10 inch tablet came with the high-performance overall configuration, No Ads, No extra bloatware installed.
  • Delivers the perfect mix of power, portability and performance – flawlessly running games and apps, as well as quicker loads of web pages, Free thousands of apps. Just logging into Google Play Store and download free apps, like Tik Tok YouTube/Kids etc.

Greater Battery Capacity

  • The tablet equipped with a large lithium battery, that allows you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more
  • You can use your 10” tablet to spend time while traveling or moving. It is really a good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Support GPS.

Quality Audiovisual Experience

  • The android tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display, Enjoy wide screen movies and games with wide viewing angles, less glare, and more brightness while you watch.
  • And with two loudspeakers, can enjoy clear sound quality when you watch videos or play games

Read more

Large Storage Space

  • This Android tablet comes bundled with 32GB ROM, and up to 128GB of external memory with micro SD card support（Not included in this tablet).
  • No more worrying about tablet memory. Huge room(128 GB Expandable) for everything, from your go-to shows to your favorite games.

HD Camera

  • The PRITOM M10 Android tablets features a 8.0MP rear-facing camera .it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments wherever you like.
  • The 2.0 MP front-facing camera is perfect for Selfie and Skype calls with friends and family.Give you a perfect time.

Tablet Cover Case

  • PLEASE NOTE: Tablet Cover Case Is Sold Separately. You can search PRITOM Tronpad 10 inch tablet case for this tablet PC.
  • Good basic tablet, Very low bloatware, No ads!

Price: $279.99 - $148.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:01 UTC – Details)


ASUS BR1100C is designed with one thing in mind: to keep on going however tough the environment gets. Built to military-grade standards, it’s packed with clever protective features, including an all-around rubber bumper, spill-resistant keyboard, and ultratough I/O ports. BR1100C also supports up to WiFi 6 for fast connectivity and has AI-powered noise-canceling technology for high-quality remote learning and conferencing. There’s battery life to handle more than a full day’s learning, and a modular design makes it easy to service, BR1100C is ready for anything!
Built for K-12 Education, with a rugged body, US military-grade durability, a tamper-resistant/spill-resistant keyboard, rubber-lined edges, and corners to reduce the impact of knocks and bumps to protect critical internal components for the classroom indoors and outdoors.
Windows 10 Pro- National Academic License
Powered by Intel Celeron N4500 Processor 1.1 GHz (4M Cache, up to 2.8 GHz, 2 cores) for fast and snappy performance.
11.6 inch HD (1366 x 768) anti-glare screen for an immersive viewing experience and a noise-reduction and HD camera with privacy shutter.

Anti-falling Screw

For easy on-site servicing and reduced downtime, the underside is securely attached using captive screws, eliminating worries about losing these little parts during repairs.

Modular Design

For easy on-site servicing and reduced downtime, ASUS BR1100C has a modular design that allows key components — such as the keyboard, battery, thermal module, and I/O ports — to be replaced in minutes using simple tools.

Anti-glare and Eye-care Technology

ASUS BR1100C has an 11.6-inch anti-glare display that reduces reflections to provide comfortable viewing for extended learning experiences — even under sunlight. The screen is also certified by TÜV Rheinland for low blue-light emissions, helping protect eyes from potential harm.

180 Lay-flat Hinge

With a lay-flat hinge, collaborate easily with students or classmates with a screen that can be laid flat.

Rubber Safety Grip

At the base of the ASUS BR1100C, a rubber grip is made so it can provide sturdy support and easier grip when carrying around to reduce the risk of fumbles and slips.

Webcam Shield

Slide over the physical cover to disable the webcam for instant privacy to keep users safe.

Noise Cancelation

With an innovative ASUS AI noise-canceling technology, isolate unwanted noise from human speech to eliminate background distractions.

Noise-reducing Camera

With an innovative 3D noise-reduction technology, the webcam can eliminate up to 94% of the random noise that naturally affects the camera to improve the image quality.

4
